data.name: Mechanic
data.description: Any time an ability consumes Kunnin' or Blastin', it will deal 25% additional damage or healing and have 25% faster build up time.

data.name: Rush
data.description: Gain 25% increased movement speed for 5 seconds. The duration is increased by 1 second for every 50 action points you had. You become exerted losing all of your action points, career mechanic points, and morale. Your AP recovery and morale per second are set to 0 for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Remove up to 10 ailments, curses, or hexes from your groupmates within 100 feet. Restore 300 health for each health removed from the target.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will heal your target for 1200 + (0.8 WIL). This ability is not effected by healing debuffs.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50% and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: Siphon the winds of magic into your body gaining 15 stacks that last for 30 seconds. You gain a 40 morale bonus to intelligence for each stack. Everytime you use an ability, a stack is consumed and you gain 10 action points.

data.name: Return Life
data.description: Resurrect your target to 1% health. Does not apply Resurrection Illness.

data.name: Ain't Done Yet!
data.description: Your outgoing healing is 25% more effective when the target is below 40% hit points.

data.name: Geddoff!
data.description: Applies 'Ey Quit Bleedin', Gork'll Fix It, and Gather Round to all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Remove up to 10 ailments, curses, or hexes from your groupmates within 100 feet. Restore 300 health for each health removed from the target.

data.name: Big Waaagh!
data.description: Deals X elemental damage.

data.name: Bigger, Better, An' Greener
data.description: Heals your target for X. For each 'Ey Quit Bleedin', Gork'll Fix It, or Gather Round you have on the target, it will be healed for an additional Y.

data.name: Bleed Fer' Me
data.description: You deal X elemental damage to your target over 24 seconds and heals your groupmates for 50% of the damage done on each tick.

data.name: Brain Bursta
data.description: Deals X elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Breath of Mork
data.description: For the next 15s, if target dies they will be resurrected with 100% health (with no penalties) and gain 50% movement speed for 10s.

data.name: Bunch o' Waaagh
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, dealing X elemental damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Burst O' Waaagh!
data.description: Whenever an ability consumes Kunnin' or Blastin', its action point cost will be reduced by 60% and can be cast while moving.

data.name: Da Green Boon
data.description:
Groupmates within 100 feet gain a (7.5 * rank) ability bonus to all resistances for one hour.

You may only give this or Mork's Buffer. But players can have both if provided from different shamans.

data.name: Da Waaagh! Is Coming
data.description: Deals X elemental damage to your target, and will then damage another target within 20 feet of them. Jumps 8 times.

data.name: Dat Makes Me Dizzy
data.description: Your can now resurrect allies instantly, but you are stunned for 3 seconds after casting.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: You gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Do Sumfin Useful
data.description: Your target gains a (5 * rank) ability bonus to toughness and they regain X health over 10 seconds.

data.name: Don' Feel Nuthin
data.description: Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier that absorbs up to X damage for up to 10 seconds.

data.name: Eeeek!
data.description: You blast back up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you, knocking them back a medium distance and snaring them by 20% for 10 seconds. Monsters will be knocked down by the blast.

data.name: 'Ere We Go!
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet will do an additional X elemental damage on their next attack within 10 seconds.

data.name: Ere We Goes Again
data.description: Ere We Go will now deal X elemental damage, and it will now affect your allies' next 2 attacks.

data.name: Extra Special Mushrooms
data.description: Gain 10% magic critical chance and 10% healing critical chance.

data.name: 'Ey, Quit Bleedin'
data.description: Heals your target for X health over 24 seconds.

data.name: Feelz No Pain
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet will have their incoming damage reduced by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Fists of Gork
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your target will take (225 + 0.2 INT) elemental damage each time an enemy tries to dispel them or whenever they take damage from Life Leaka or Get'n Smarter. In addition, dispels will not function against the target, this does not affect morales.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring, or disabling effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Fury of Da Green
data.description:
This ability will always consume Kunnin' or Blastin'. If cast with Blastin', deal X elemental damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of the target. You will heal each groupmate within 100 feet for Y + 50% of the damage dealt.

If cast with Kunnin', deal X elemental damage to up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of target. Heal up to 6 allies within 30 feet of the target and each groupmate within 100 feet of the target for Y + 50% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Gather Round
data.description: Heals all groupmates within 100 feet for X and another Y over 6 seconds.

data.name: Gedup!
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health. For the next 45 seconds, the target will be afflicted with Resurrection Illness.

data.name: Get Movin'!
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates damages an enemy with 'Ere We Go, they will gain 15 morale per second for 8 seconds.

data.name: Get'n Smarter
data.description: Steals (3 * rank) ability bonus to intelligence from your target while dealing Y elemental damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Git Outta Here!
data.description: Reduces Eeeek!'s cooldown time by 40 seconds.

data.name: Gork Sez Stop
data.description: Your target suffers 600 damage over 2s. If the target moves, the duration is restarted.

data.name: Gork'll Fix It
data.description: Your target regains X health immediately then continues to gain another Y health over 10 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Gork's Barbs'
data.description: Deals 178 elemental damage. Gork takes interest in your target, reducing all incoming heals by 50% for 10 seconds. Whenever they are healed, Gork's displeasure will strike the healer for Y elemental damage.

data.name: Green Cleanin'
data.description: If Greener 'N Cleaner successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain X health over 5 seconds.

data.name: Greener 'n Cleaner
data.note:
Target must be cursed or ailing
Mork's Waaagh! reduces cooldown
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
data.description: You cleanse an ally, removing one curse or ailment. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to X damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Hurts, Don't It?
data.description:
Brain Bursta will cause the target to take a X tactic penalty to toughness for 20 seconds. Duration and tick interval of Bunch o Waagh is reduced by 50%.

You cannot use Greener N' Cleaner, Stop Hittin' Me, or Gedup!

data.name: I'll Take That!
data.note:
Gork's Waaagh! reduces cast time.
Gork's Waaagh! allows move-casting.
data.description: Deals X (int mod) elemental damage to your target and heals your defensive target for Y (wil mod) plus 150% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Life Leaka
data.description: You deal X elemental damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Look Over There!
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Lookit What I Did!
data.description: Gork'll Fix It will now also restore 50 action points to the target over the duration.

data.name: Mork's Buffer
data.description: Infuses all groupmates within 100 feet with Mork's Buffer for 1 hour. Anytime they have 'Ey Quit Bleedin', Gork'll Fix It, Do Sumfin Useful, or Gather Round applied they will gain 2% reduced chance to be critically hit for the duration. This will only work with one instance of each but stacks with each other to a maximum of 8%.

data.name: Mork's Touch
data.description: Big Waaagh will now deal X elemental damage and remove 1 blessing from the target.

data.name: Nuthin' But Da WAAAGH!
data.description: Don' Feel Nuthin will also cause your target to deal 15% more damage as long as the barrier is protecting them, but its cooldown is increased to 20 seconds.

data.name: Pass It On
data.description: Any time you heal an ally with a Path of Mork ability, there is a 50% chance that a groupmate within 100 feet will be helaed for X health as well. This can only happen for each groupmate once every second.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: RUN AWAY!
data.description: Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Scrub Ya Gud!
data.description: Each of your Path of Mork healing over time effects has a 25% chance to restore 5 action points to you whenever they tick.

data.name: Scuse Me!
data.description: Target and all enemies within 20 feet take X elemental damage and take a Y ability penalty to elemental resistance for 20 seconds.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.description:
An ally is charged with Waaagh for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near fatal wounds.

If the allies health is reduced below 30%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore X health if they are still alive. As long as this effect persists, the value of incoming heals on the target is increased by 25%

A player may only be affected by a single Shrug it Off at a time.

data.name: Sneaky and Clever
data.description: If you have Da Green Boon, you will now have 5 stacks of Gork. If you have 5 stacks of Mork's Buffer, you will now have 5 stacks of Mork.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 300 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Steal Yer Thunder
data.description: Reduces the stats of all enemies within 30 feet of your target by 35 (except wounds), and increases and all your groupmembers' stats by 35 (except wounds) for 15 seconds.

data.name: Sticky Feetz
data.description: For 10 seconds, all enemies within 20 feet of a spot that you select take a X ability penalty to initiative and become snared, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Stop hittin' me!
data.description: Your chance to disrupt attacks is increased by 5%, and you detaunt all enemies within 30 feet for 10 seconds, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Too Smart For Dat
data.description: Increases your spirit resistance by 300. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and elemental resistances.

data.name: Waaagh! Frenzy
data.description: Sneaky and Clever's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Whazat Behind You?!
data.description:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 75% damage to you for 5 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Yer Not So Bad
data.description: You restore 180 action points over 10 seconds but cannot generate stacks of Gork or Mork.

data.name: You Got Nuthin!
data.description: Deals X elemental damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: You Really Got Nuthin
data.description: Life Leaka and Get N' Smarter will now effect all enemies within 30 feet of your target. The cooldowns on these abilities are increased by 5 seconds.

data.name: You Weren't Using Dat
data.description: Removes 100 AP from each enemy within 30 feet, and gives 50% of the stolen AP to you.
